alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Heavy rainshowers will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo and west central Cameron Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rainshowers over Relampago, or near Santa Maria, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Mercedes, La Feria, Progreso, Los Indios, Santa Maria, Rangerville, Progreso City Offices, La Feria Police Department and Rangerville Elementary School. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 804 and 820. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these showers and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
